node.detail_zh: 患者為外傭，6 月 30 日離開舊僱主住所，及後入住安盛僱傭公司於上環建安商業大廈的宿舍。8 月 1 日轉往新僱主住所，8 月 4 日開始發燒，在等候檢測結果期間暫住於香港九龍東智選假日酒店。
node.detail_en: The patient is a foreign domestic helper and began staying at the boarding house of Apik Empolyment Agency at Kin On Commercial Building, Sheung Wan upon departure from the home of her former employer on June 30. She arrived at the home of her new employer on August 1, developed fever on August 4, and temporarily stayed at Holiday Inn Express Hong Kong Kowloon East while awaiting testing results.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.name_zh: 上環建安商業大廈外傭宿舍
groups.name_en: Kin On Commercial Building (Sheung Wan) Boarding House for Domestic Helpers
groups.description_zh: 同住在上環建安商業大廈宿舍的 5 名印尼外傭確診。
groups.description_en: Five Indonesian domestic helpers residing at the boarding house of Kin On Commercial Building, Sheung Wan were diagnosed positive for the virus.
